data.meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
data.sentence: The word رَبِّكُمْ comes from the root ر ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word الْعَذَابُ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: to accept/admit/receive/agree, meet anyone, to face/encounter someone/something, advance/approach, correspond, counteract/compare/requite/compensate, the front part (12:26), accept with approval, show favour.. qablu - before/formerly,. qubulun - the fore-part, face to face, before, plural of qabilum,. qibalun - power, side, part,. qiblah - towards, in the direction of, facing, alongside,. qiblatun - anything before, opposite, the point in the direction of which prayer is performed, the Ka'bah at Makkah, a place of worship,. qabulun - favourable reception, gracious acceptance,. qabilun - tribe, host, plural qabilatun,. qabailun - tribe,. aqbala - to come near, draw near, approach, turn towards, rush upon,. taqabbala - to accept,. mutaqabilun - opposite to, facing one another,. mustaqbilun - proceeding towards, heading towards.
data.sentence: The word قَبْلِ comes from the root ق ب ل and is associated with the meanings: to accept/admit/receive/agree, meet anyone, to face/encounter someone/something, advance/approach, correspond, counteract/compare/requite/compensate, the front part (12:26), accept with approval, show favour.. qablu - before/formerly,. qubulun - the fore-part, face to face, before, plural of qabilum,. qibalun - power, side, part,. qiblah - towards, in the direction of, facing, alongside,. qiblatun - anything before, opposite, the point in the direction of which prayer is performed, the Ka'bah at Makkah, a place of worship,. qabulun - favourable reception, gracious acceptance,. qabilun - tribe, host, plural qabilatun,. qabailun - tribe,. aqbala - to come near, draw near, approach, turn towards, rush upon,. taqabbala - to accept,. mutaqabilun - opposite to, facing one another,. mustaqbilun - proceeding towards, heading towards.

data.meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake
data.sentence: The word يَأْتِيَكُمُ comes from the root ا ت ي and is associated with the meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake
The word تُنْصَرُونَ comes from the root ن ص ر and is associated with the meanings: to assist/aid, succour, protect.

data.meanings: to supply the place of another. anaaba - to repent and turn again and again and consecutively (to God) with sincere deeds.
data.sentence: The word وَأَنِيبُوا comes from the root ن و ب and is associated with the meanings: to supply the place of another. anaaba - to repent and turn again and again and consecutively (to God) with sincere deeds.

data.meanings: safety/security/freedom/immunity, to escape, salutation/greeting/peace, deliver/acknowledge, pay in advance, submit, sincerity, humility, submission/conformance/obedience, resign/quit/relinquish, to be in sound condition, well without blemish, gentle/tender/soft/elegant. Solomon/Sulaiman.
data.sentence: The word وَأَسْلِمُوا comes from the root س ل م and is associated with the meanings: safety/security/freedom/immunity, to escape, salutation/greeting/peace, deliver/acknowledge, pay in advance, submit, sincerity, humility, submission/conformance/obedience, resign/quit/relinquish, to be in sound condition, well without blemish, gentle/tender/soft/elegant.
